```{r}
nyc_clean <- nyc[-c(1, 3:27, 29:36, 39:69, 72:74, 76:125)]
nyc_clean$DATE  <- as.Date(nyc_clean$DATE)
nyc_clean$Year  <- year(ymd(nyc_clean$DATE))
nyc_clean$Month <- month(ymd(nyc_clean$DATE))
nyc_clean$Day   <- day(ymd(nyc_clean$DATE))

nyc_clean <- nyc_clean %>% relocate(Year, .after = DATE) %>% 
                        relocate(Month, .after = Year) %>% 
                        relocate(Day, .after = Month) %>%                                                         filter(!is.na(DailyAverageDryBulbTemperature))
```
